name: Merry Crisis: The War on Christmas
name_original: Merry Crisis: The War on Christmas
description: An entry for "Jame Game." The theme was "save Christmas" and we had to incorporate Santa's hat as an important object. Here's our take on it. It's just prototype for now, and has several bugs, but it may receive some updates down the line when I learn how to use GBStudio 3.0 better. I tried to make a GBC game with some shooting elements, but it proved harder than I thought.
